keyMoments.title: Luffy Invites Sanji to Join
keyMoments.description: Luffy officially invites Sanji to become the cook of the Straw Hat Pirates after the defeat of Don Krieg. Sanji initially refuses due to his obligation to the Baratie.
keyMoments.significance: The beginning of Sanji's recruitment arc, setting up his emotional departure from the Baratie.
keyMoments.quote: I can't. I have a debt to this restaurant and to the old man.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Reveals His Dream of the All Blue
keyMoments.description: Sanji shares his lifelong dream with Luffy: to find the All Blue, a legendary ocean where all four seas meet.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Sanji's core motivation and dream that will drive him throughout the series.
keyMoments.quote: The All Blue... a chef's paradise where all four seas meet. That's my dream.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Officially Joins the Straw Hat Pirates
keyMoments.description: After understanding Zeff's true intentions, Sanji accepts Luffy's invitation and officially becomes the cook of the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Sanji becoming the fourth official member of the crew and their first specialized non-combat role.
keyMoments.quote: Alright, Luffy. I'll be your cook.

keyMoments.title: Sanji's Tearful Farewell to Zeff
keyMoments.description: Sanji kneels on the deck and tearfully thanks Zeff for everything, bowing deeply in respect and gratitude to his mentor and father figure.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most iconic emotional scenes in early One Piece, crystallizing the father-son relationship between Sanji and Zeff.
keyMoments.quote: Owner Zeff! I owe you a debt I can never repay! All this time, for all these years... I truly appreciate it! Thank you for everything!

relationships.description: Zeff is Sanji's mentor and father figure who raised him at the Baratie and taught him everything about cooking. Their relationship is defined by tough love and mutual respect.

evolutionMoments.description: Zeff orchestrates a fake criticism of Sanji's cooking to free him from obligation and encourage him to pursue his dream. Sanji delivers a tearful farewell, acknowledging the debt he owes Zeff.

relationships.description: Sanji accepts Luffy's invitation to join the Straw Hat Pirates as their cook, forming a bond of trust and shared adventure.

evolutionMoments.description: Sanji officially joins Luffy's crew after being freed from his sense of obligation to the Baratie.

reveals.information: Wants to find the All Blue, a chef's paradise where all four seas meet
Officially joins the Straw Hat Pirates as their cook
